paragraphs: Popular Belarusian stand-up comedian Vanya Usovich will perform in Prague for the first time. He will present his new, third major concert.
The performance will take place on October 10th on the stage of the Hybernia theater in the city center.
👉 Tickets can be purchased through this link.

"Ivan Usovich always carefully controlled the level of his media presence, rarely appearing in the public sphere. The comedian focused only on significant career events. Two of his concerts became just that: 'Another Day' and '40 Years Maximum,' which have already gathered tens of millions of views."

Vanya did not stray from his principles this time, temporarily disappearing from the media space. Only after a creative pause did the comedian decide to go on tour with his third stand-up concert. "According to Vanya, missing out on this is one of the main mistakes in your life," the concert announcement says.
📍 Where: Divadlo Hybernia, Náměstí Republiky 3/4, Prague 1
🎫 Tickets are being sold at this link.
Vanya Usovich's second concert titled "40 Years Maximum" was released on YouTube in December 2023 and has gathered nearly 20 million views to this day.
